comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: All glory, laud, and honor to Thee, Redeemer, King, to whom the lips of children made sweet hosannas ring: Thou art the King of Israel Thou David’s royal Son, who in the Lord’s name comest, the King and blessed One.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The people of the Hebrews with palms before Thee went; our praise and prayer and anthems before Thee we present. To Thee, before Thy passion, they sang their hymns of praise; to Thee, now high exalted, our melody we raise.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Thou didst accept their praises; accept the pray'rs we bring, who in all good delightest, Thou good and gracious King! The company of angels are praising Thee on high, and we with all creation in chorus make reply.
